mainInformationText: With this adapter you can smooth your signals according to a selected fomula. Also you can select one id more than one time to smooth it with different formula.
refreshWithValuechangeTooltip: additional refresh if the state changes
refreshRateTooltip: here you can set the refresh rate, with which the smoothed result should be updated
typeTooltip: here you can set the desired type for smooth the signal
name: name of the smoothed value
nameId: input your favorite name, of the result of the smoothed calculation
idTooltip: choose the state-id of the state wich should be smoothed
limitMinimumTooltip: By selecting this option you can enter a value to limit the valid values ​​in the negative direction
minimumValueTooltip: Enter the smallest valid value here (all values ​​smaller than this will be limited to this)
limitMaximumTooltip: By selecting this option you can enter a value to limit the valid values ​​in the positive direction
maximumValueTooltip: Enter the biggest valid value here (all values bigger than this will be limited to this)
limitDecimalplacesTooltip: By selecting this option you can limit the decimal places of the result
ignoreStandardDeviationTooltip: if there is a new value greater than the given standard deviation, it will be ignored
standardDeviationLimitTooltip: define a multiplicator of standard defiation
unsmoothedStandardDeviationTimeTooltip: select the time the standard deviation works with unsmoothed values
